display_long_description:
🏁 Race Toward Your Dream
Welcome to a VR racing experience where speed meets soul.
This isn’t just about winning — it’s about becoming who you were meant to be.

🌍 Explore Breathtaking Worlds
Drive across stunning landscapes — from icy valleys and countryside roads to thunderstorm-ridden mountain paths.
Each track tells part of your story, crafted with immersive visuals and atmospheric sound.

🎮 Fully Immersive Controls
Built for Meta Quest using intuitive VR steering

Seated or standing play supported

Realistic vehicle physics for an authentic feel

🧭 A Journey That Drives You
You play as a girl who dares to dream differently — pushing past doubts, expectations, and fear.
With every race, she proves that dreams are not distractions — they are destinations.

✨ Features
🏎️ Immersive first-person driving experience

🌦️ Dynamic environments across multiple levels

🎙️ Poetic voiceovers and emotional cutscenes

🎯 Smooth difficulty curve with rewarding progression

📸 Optimized for comfort, clarity, and replayability

💬 Your Dream. Your Drive.
“They said I was lost in a dream. I showed them the road I made of it.”

📧 Questions or Feedback?
Reach out to us at zunaira.nazir30@gmail.com
